settings.text:
NestBox M15

Retro Gaming. Plug & Play. Instant Fun.
Bring back the nostalgia with the NestBox M15, a compact retro game stick that turns any TV, monitor, or projector into a full gaming console.
No installations, no internet‚Äîjust plug in and play.

üíæ Available Versions

64 GB Version
‚Ä¢ ~20,000 preloaded games
‚Ä¢ Ideal for casual players and retro beginners

128 GB Version
‚Ä¢ ~30,000 preloaded games
‚Ä¢ Perfect for hardcore gamers and collectors

‚≠ê Key Features

  • üéÆ Dual Wireless Controllers ‚Äì Includes 2√ó 2.4GHz wireless gamepads with stable, low-latency signal
  • üì∫ Universal Display Support ‚Äì Works with TVs, monitors, and projectors via HDMI
  • üíæ Expandable Storage ‚Äì Supports TF (MicroSD) memory expansion
  • üß≠ User-Friendly Interface ‚Äì Easy navigation, fast game switching, save & load states
  • üöÄ True Plug & Play ‚Äì No setup, no downloads, no internet required

üì¶ What‚Äôs in the Box

  • 1 √ó NestBox M15 Game Stick
  • 2 √ó Wireless Controllers
  • 1 √ó USB Receiver
  • 1 √ó HDMI Cable
  • 1 √ó USB Type-C Power Cable
  • 1 √ó English User Manual

üïπÔ∏è Supported Emulators (30+)


PS1 ¬∑ N64 ¬∑ MAME (Arcade) ¬∑ NES ¬∑ SNES ¬∑ GB ¬∑ GBC ¬∑ GBA ¬∑ Sega Genesis (MD) ¬∑ FC ¬∑ SFC ¬∑ CPS ¬∑ WSC ¬∑ and many more

Thousands of classic games are preloaded no downloads required.

Tekken 3 ¬∑ Crash Bandicoot ¬∑ Pepsiman

Pok√©mon FireRed ¬∑ Mario Kart ¬∑ Castlevania

‚ùì Common Questions

Does it need Wi-Fi?
No. All games are pre-installed.

Can I use it with a projector or monitor?
Yes. Any HDMI-compatible screen works.

Can I save my progress?
Yes. Save and load game states are supported.

Is it laggy or unstable?
No. Stable 2.4GHz wireless connection ensures smooth gameplay.

üéÅ Omnyro Recommends


Pair the NestBox M15 with one of our premium projectors and a NestScreen for the ultimate retro gaming night.
Perfect for living rooms, dorms, and family gatherings.

NestBox M15 ‚Äì Classic Gaming. Modern Convenience.

settings.title: Got this for my kids and they absolutely love it!
settings.text: It‚Äôs easy to set up and has so many fun games. I love that we can connect it to the TV and play together as a family definitely worth it.
settings.author: Karen Phillips

settings.title: Didn‚Äôt expect to have this much fun with it!
settings.text: Super easy setup, and it works perfectly on my big screen. Feels nostalgic but still modern awesome for parties or casual gaming.
settings.author: Chris Moore

settings.title: Really fun little console.
settings.text: Plugged it into my TV and was playing in minutes. The controllers feel solid and there‚Äôs a ton of classic games on it. Great for chilling with friends.
settings.author: Derek Johnson

settings.title: Bought this console for our family nights and it‚Äôs been a hit.
settings.text: The two controllers make it perfect for playing with the kids. Simple to use, works great on our TV, and brings back that retro vibe I grew up with.
settings.author: Mark Phillips
